name: Sogeking
text: On Play: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less to the owner's hand. Then, draw 2 cards and trash 2 cards.

effect.text: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less to the owner's hand. Then, draw 2 cards and trash 2 cards.

meta.notes: The card's name is also treated as [Usopp]. Rarity 'SEC' is printed in the bottom right corner. The 'Counter +1000' text is visible on the left side of the card.
